thread.title: CeeLo Green wears utterly bizarre gold outfit and mask as he attends the Grammy Awards 2017
thread.title_full: CeeLo Green wears utterly bizarre gold outfit and mask as he attends the Grammy Awards 2017

author: rhill
title: CeeLo Green wears utterly bizarre gold outfit and mask as he attends the Grammy Awards 2017
text:
CeeLo Green wears utterly bizarre gold outfit and mask as he attends the Grammy Awards 2017 
The artist hit the red carpet as his alter ego Gnarly Davidson By ROSE HILL Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments CEELO Green went all out on his outfit for the 59th Grammy Awards ‚Äì by dressing head to toe in gold. 
The music artist hit the red carpet as his alter ego Gnarly Davidson and was dripping in gold, quite literally. Getty Images - WireImage CeeLo Green went all out on his Grammys outfit this year 
He wore a gold mask and painted his hands and floor-length outfit. 
CeeLo apparently remarked on the red carpet: ‚ÄúI woke up like this.‚Äù 
Of course, the internet blew up and compared him to C3PO, a Dr Who villain and a gold wrapped Lindt chocolate truffle. Getty Images - WireImage The hitmaker had painted himself in gold and looked more cyborg than human Reuters CeeLo apparently ‚Äòwoke up‚Äô like this RELATED STORIES perils of live TV Lady Gaga and Metallica's fiery duet falters at Grammys as unlikely pair hit by technical mishap 'I CAN'T MESS THIS UP' Adele sobs as she demands to restart tribute to George Michael during Grammys live show blah blah land Luvvies ditch the thank-yous and use Bafta podium as a soap-box to take swipes Trump HITTING NEW HEIGHTS Chrissy Teigen, Charlie XCX, Heidi Klum and Paris Jackson stun on the red carpet at the Grammys SUPPORTING MUM Beyonce's adorable daughter Blue Ivy sits on Jay Z's lap at the Grammys as they watch performance GETTING IT OFF HER CHEST Lady Gaga shows off plenty of underboob at Grammys 2017 in extremely revealing cut out crop top AWKWARD Burberry make embarrassing Bafta gaffe as they confuse Dev Patel with British rapper Riz Ahmed bump's big night Beyonce debuts baby bump at the Grammys 2017 as she takes to stage and performs Mother's Pride TOP DOG French bulldog made popular by celebs like Lady Gaga and Lauren Goodger set to replace labradors as fave dog HITTING SOME BUM NOTES Jennifer Lopez, Katy Perry and Lady Gaga fail to impress at Grammy Awards 2017 ANOTHER ONE BITES THE SLOPES Mark Dolan is second celebrity to leave The Jump as Louis Smith takes the lead The perfect ending David Bowie and Adele win big at the Grammy Awards 2017 
One joked: ‚Äú#goldisnotyourcolour Ceelo Green ü§êü§ê #Grammys.‚Äù 
Another tweeted: ‚Äú@CeeLoGreen looks like a gold wrapped white chocolate truffle #GRAMMYS.‚Äù CeeLo Green is channeling his inner C3PLo #GRAMMYs @CeeLoGreen pic.twitter.com/H9fCtQSVmk
